title: Frontend Software Engineer (contract)
description: An online learning platform serving bootcamp students, enterprise clients, and entrepreneurs
work: • Lead a redesign of user facing pages to improve performance and user experience• Implemented React best practices and refactored components to be composable• Utilized memory profiler, mini profiler, and Chrome Dev Tools to troubleshoot slow load times and implement a solution, reducing initial load time from up to 12s to as low as 224ms• Implemented lazy load, debounce, and memoization to improve app responsiveness• Improved the speed of search and filtering on a user-facing page of the app from 500ms to less than 100ms• Used Chrome Lighthouse and Accessibility Insights to review app accessibility and fix issues

title: Software Engineer
description: SAAS company serving the film and television industry
work: • Built new features in React and used agile methodologies to decrease time to release by 50%• Implemented Redux to improve consistency and solve life cycle and state management bugs• Migrated parts of the app from AngularJS to React and proactively updated documentation• Utilized Redux and Redux-sagas to improve integration of older parts of the codebase with a new architecture, reducing needed maintenance and allowing the development of new features• Troubleshot and solved bugs relating to builds and deployment using Webpack configuration and Jenkins pipeline knowledge• Reviewed team members’ code and helped onboard new developers and contractors

title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
description: A full-featured web app for buying and selling stocks. Built with Postgres, React, ExpressJS, Node and deployed on AWS
work: • Optimized database and data design and shape for fast queries• Deployed service to AWS and tested, optimized, and scaled for production web traffic• Horizontally scaled service to increase capacity from 400 rps up to 2400 rps with a latency of less than 200 ms• Implemented an NginX server load balancer• Leveraged New Relic and Loader.io to test and optimize capacity and performance

title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
description: A marketplace for reviewing and purchasing video games. Built with React, Mysql, ExpressJS, Node, Docker, and deployed on AWS
work: • Crafted the additional content, recent updates, and checkout modules using React and Styled Components, focusing on a clean separation of concerns and interactivity• Designed a database and API back-end using Express and MySql (with Sequelize) using RESTful API best practices to represent relationships between assets• Dockerized services and deployed to AWS• Utilized and implemented micro-services development to increase team efficiency and product scalability

title: Full-Stack Software Engineer
description: A website for reviewing and sharing craft beer. Built with React, Mysql, ExpressJS, Node
work: • Conceptualized, wireframed, and built the front-end and back-end for an interactive web app• Designed and built a complex API and database architecture for handling and sorting a large dataset• Focused on test driven development and core functionality to deliver a superior and feature-rich product

title: Data Manager
description: A color and post production company serving commercial and theatrical clients
work: • Managed and oversaw all daily operations of the Data i/o department and ensured server and storage performance and operation and the data workflow of all projects in the pipeline• Used the terminal and bash scripts to automate tasks and manage local and server storage states• Managed and implemented data heavy processes across different operating systems and networks• Interfaced between many different teams and projects to ensure data needs are met• Formulated and implemented workflows based on each project's needs• Wrote, debugged, and deployed bash scripts to automate and track processes• Created, managed, and tracked LTO tape archives and ensured best backup practices• Prepared and created delivery media in proper DCP formats using CRU drives• Managed and tracked all online and offline storage and ensured top performance across the network

title: VFX Artist and VR/AR Developer
description: A color and VFX production company serving major production studios on major motion pictures
work: • Develop AR/VR prototype applications in Unity3d using Vuforia AR, ARkit, and C#• Work with producers to plan and design technical and creative approach• Configure and integrate Vuforia AR image and object tracking in Unity3D• Implement ARkit ground plane detection and dynamic trigger events• Write custom C# code and CG/HLSL shaders tailored to the needs of each project• Setup and implement version control using Git and SourceTree• Optimize AR/VR assets in Maya and Meshlab for use in Unity and on mobile platforms• Model, rig, and animate characters and objects for use in AR/VR mobile applications• 3D track with SynthEyes and rotoscope in Nuke Studio• Compositing support in Nuke• Capturing images on-set for texture referencing, HDRI lightprobes, and photogrammetry• Building and implementing HDRI lightprobes• Photogrammetry in Agisoft PhotoScan and AutoDesk 123D Catch
